document_data.mainbody:
The Caravan Gate was the main entry point into the city of Daggerford in the Western Heartlands in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The Caravan Gate was located in western Daggerford at the intersection of Dukes Way and Wall Street.
The gate was only accessible after crossing a moat and bridge. The road leading through the gate passed beneath a section of Daggerfords outer wall that was guarded by a pair of large towers.
